title: need a new champ
body:
Hey! I don't know who I should buy, so I thought I would ask the boards!
I like playing mid, top, and supp but im probably looking for a top/supp champ. I main Irelia and i love her but i want more champs under my belt. Im more into that glass canon build then tank, i dont mind taking some time to learn a harder champ and i have 10000 ip. also wondering which sup you would recommend? Im not big on sona or janna. thanks :)

replies.body: Also, why did this thread title make me think of [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=N6uEMOeDZsA](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=N6uEMOeDZsA)?
I main Irelia too, really enjoy her ^_^ I would recommend Wukong, he plays similarly but has a much stronger teamfight and is more bursty.
thank you!!! ires my forever favourite she's so fun to play and her kit is SO GOOD i love her

Thresh support my friend, higher skill cap then lots of supports, but if you get it right then you will be able to effectively carry bot lane and even your team with him, but you will need practice to be of any use

Magicmilly, just unlock bulk cheap champs, rather than a couple of 6300's. The more different champs you play, the more you'll get a feel for what fits you. Get all the 450's and 1300's etc. Then pick and choose for the more expensive ones.

Grind that ip, make sure to get your FWotD bonus every day (if/when possible), even if you just login, get a win, and logout.
thats a good idea thank you!!! im keen to try heaps of different ones so il try that yeah. thanks!

{{champion:53}}  or {{champion:412}} for the sup, I haven't taken the time to get the ropes of thresh yet, but I main Blitzy when I sup and he is a lot of fun.
Also if you enjoy glass cannons you can always go for the high damage dealers and amplify it, like {{champion:86}} or {{champion:122}} top? Just straight damage output skimping on the lifeline of armor/mr etc. I love Garen because he is easy, and tanks well which is what i usually do with him. But a cut throat damage dealer works well on him if you position yourself right in the fights etc.

Also {{champion:41}} is a lot of fun to play top
Thresh is worth the time to master, you can carry the worst of adcs and spoonfeed them till late, he is bae
I believe you there, i've even seen a Thresh ADC carry a game lol. He is next on my list of champs to learn.

If you mean a champion with both Top/Support roles, here they are below

Leona is a Tank/Support
Kayle is a Fighter/Support
Braum is a Support/Tank
Tahm Kench is a Support/Tank
Taric is a Support/Fighter
Thresh is a Support/Fighter
Alistar is a Tank/Support

Out of the list above, I would suggest you to get Leona.

If you simply mean either top laner or support champion, I would suggest you to consider Akali, Darius, you may want to consider getting Riven (if you haven't already). Riven is not that hard to use but she's not very easy to master, and if you didn't use her properly, she could be countered very easily.

For support you may want to get Zilean.
Lulu. She is the most annoying and funny champ to play in lane. She can sup well, and if ur good, u can mid or top
